TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract HttpWorkerRequest extends System.Object

summary.span: 此抽象类定义由 ASP.NET 托管代码用于处理请求的基本辅助方法和枚举。

span.span: This abstract class defines the base worker methods and enumerations used by ASP.NET managed code to process requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在大多数情况下，代码不会直接处理， 因为请求和响应数据通过 和 类公开。In most cases, your code will not deal with directly because request and response data are exposed through the and classes. 某些内部 ASP.NET 类扩展了此类。Some internal ASP.NET classes extend this class. 如果代码实现自己的宿主环境，则需要扩展此类以调用 方法。If your code implements its own hosting environment, it will need to extend this class to call the method. 此外，你的代码可以创建一个派生类，以便在给定应用程序中执行子请求，以便将其实例传递到 。In addition, your code could create a derived class for the purpose of child-request execution within a given application in order to pass its instance to . 在这种情况下，派生类应保留对当前的引用 并将大多数方法委托给它。In this case, the derived class should keep a reference to the current and delegate most of the methods to it.

.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数是类的无参数构造函数 。The constructor is the parameterless constructor for the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual IAsyncResult BeginFlush (AsyncCallback callback, object state);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginFlush(class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed
Public Overridable Function BeginFlush (callback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: virtual IAsyncResult ^ BeginFlush(AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);
abstract member BeginFlush : AsyncCallback * obj -> IAsyncResult override this.BeginFlush : AsyncCallback * obj -> IAsyncResult

param.name: callback
param.span: 相应异步操作完成时要调用的方法。

span.span: The method to call when a corresponding asynchronous operation completes.

param.name: state
param.span: 一个用户提供的对象，它将该特定的异步刷新操作与其他请求区别开来。

span.span: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous flush operation from other requests.

summary.span: 向客户端发送当前所有缓冲的响应。

span.span: Sends the currently buffered response to the client.

returns.span: 辅助请求缓冲区状态、标题和响应正文，直到生成创始异步的操作。

span.span: The worker request buffers the status, headers, and response body until an asynchronous flush operation is initiated.

returns.span: 如果潜在的 对象支持异步刷新，且该方法是被异步模块事件或异步处理程序所调用，则发送操作将以异步方式执行。

span.span: If the underlying object supports asynchronous flush and this method is called from an asynchronous module event or asynchronous handler, the send operation is performed asynchronously.

returns.span: 否则，实现执行同步刷新操作。

span.span: Otherwise, the implementation performs a synchronous flush operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 即使尚未到达流的末尾，实现也可以自由返回比请求更少的字节。An implementation is free to return fewer bytes than requested even if the end of the stream has not been reached. 此重载用于指定大于 2 GB 的消息正文的响应。Use this overload to specify the response for message bodies greater than 2 GB.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 即使尚未到达流的末尾，实现也可以自由返回比请求更少的字节。An implementation is free to return fewer bytes than requested even if the end of the stream has not been reached. 此重载用于指定大于 2 GB 的消息正文的响应。Use this overload to specify the response for message bodies greater than 2 GB.

summary.span: 获取当前请求的 Windows 跟踪 ID 的对应事件跟踪。

span.span: Gets the corresponding Event Tracking for Windows trace ID for the current request.

value.span: 当前 ASP.NET 请求的跟踪 ID。

span.span: A trace ID for the current ASP.NET request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 请求的执行与对应的 IIS 请求的跟踪 ID 相同。ASP.NET requests execute with the same trace ID as the corresponding IIS request. 这有助于在整个生存期中跟踪请求，从 HTTP.SYS 内核模式 HTTP 侦听器开始，到 IIS 服务，再到 ASP.NET 系统。This facilitates tracking a request throughout its lifetime, starting with the HTTP.SYS kernel-mode HTTP listener, through the IIS service, and into the ASP.NET system. IIS 提供的 Id 因平台和 Service Pack 级别而异。The IDs provided by IIS differ based on the platform and service pack level.
